results.title: Live Laugh Love Wall Fine Art Prints Cottage Farmhouse Dandelion Flower Floral Glass Teal Blue Grey Set of 3 Unframed Paper Prints or Canvas
results.description:
Beautiful & Classy Live, Laugh, Love Quotes, Wall Art Prints Set of 3, in beautiful blended shades of blues: Glass Blue, Teal, a touch of Turquoise and Grey colors all in lovely distressed textured designs. A wonderful Bold Farmhouse Cottage Home Decor feel to them. Live Every Moment, Laugh Every Day, Love Beyond Words Quotes.... Modern, lovely and happy inspiring words to live by. Complete with Floral Abstract art Fine Art Prints, Set of 3 prints. Would be perfect for the living room, bedroom or kitchen to uplift your space.

..............Comes in Your Choice These Sizes: Set of (3) 5" x 7"; 8" x 10", 11" x 14" or 16" x 20"

★ IMPORTANT - Fine Art Paper Prints Are For the "Prints" Only - ART PRINTS COMES UNFRAMED (>>They will require framing<<)

★ Canvas Wraps Come Ready To Hang (no framing required).

ORDERING:

★ Choose your Sizes & Product Style (Prints -OR- Canvas Wraps) from the drop down menu.

*********************************************
★ FINE ART PAPER PRINTS are freshly professionally printed by me in my home studio as I am also a professional printer. And I will use either Ultra Pro Satin Archival Luster OR Fine Art Matte papers whichever paper looks best with colors. They are Giclee Quality, acid free to prevent yellowing & Will last a lifetime behind glass.

★ Canvas Wraps - will be professionally made on beautiful high quality canvas on sturdy pine stretcher bars and are 100% guaranteed.

SHIPPING:
Prints will be carefully packaged in a cellophane acid free sleeves and slipped into a sturdy flat mailer to assure art is protected. ***All Fine Art Paper Prints orders will ship within approximately 3-5 business days upon receipt of payment.

>> Canvas Wrap Orders typically ship within 5-7 days from date of order.

NOTE: 
***Image coloring and detail may very slightly from your computer screen to actual print . 

COPYRIGHT NOTICE:
***All of my prints are original artwork and are copyright protected. 

Visit my shop: http://www.7wondersdesign.etsy.com

Thank you for visiting, and have a wonderful day!

Leslie M Fuqua-Owner/Artist 
7-Wonders Design

results.title: Live Well Laugh Often Love Always SVG | Live Well Laugh SVG | Live Well SVG | Laugh Svg | Love Always Svg| Wedding Quote Svg| Wedding Saying
results.description:
WELCOME TO DIGITALDESIGNSSVG ! 
 

🔔[ You Will Receive ]🔔
 
After the purchase you will receive 1 ZIP file that contains:
 
- 1 SVG File
- 1 EPS File
- 1 PNG File
- 1 JPG File
- 1 PDF File
- 1 DXF File
 
 This is INSTANT and DIGITAL DOWNLOAD.
 All the images are high resolution 300 dpi. 
 
- SVG can be used with: Cricut Design Space, and Silhouette Designer Edition, Sure Cuts A Lot (SCAL) and Brother Scan.
- DXF can be used with: Silhouette Basic Edition.
- EPS can be used with: CorelDraw, Inkscape, and Adobe Illustrator
- PNG is a photo file with a transparent background
 

🔔[ Shipping ]🔔
 
These are digital SVG files, no physical item will be sent to you.

Once your payment is confirmed, files will be delivered electronically. 
 

🔔[ Usage ]🔔
 
You can use this file to create, cut and / or print items for personal use, gifts.
 
These files can be used with:
 
- Design Space (Cricut)
- Silhouette Studio (Cameo 1, 2 and 3)
- Inkscape
- Corel Draw
- Adobe Illustrator
 

🔔[ Refund ]🔔
 
 Due to being digital files, it’s impossible to have the product returned. Therefore, we’re unable to offer refunds.
 
 If any problem will occur, please contact me and I'll be happy to fix it.  


🔔[ Note ]🔔

 Moreover, We will also send you a download notification email separate from any transaction notification emails you receive from Etsy and/or PayPal.Please check your spam or junk inbox. If it’s not there, add transaction (at) etsy.com to your address book or safe list.

- If you do not receive your order, please contact us.
- Files only for personal use.
- Do not share or sell these files.

 Please be sure to have the correct software for opening and using these file types.

results.title: Butterfly  blanket her name my beloved daughter never forget that i love you everyday laugh love live with love and kisses mommy
results.description:
- BLANKET SIZES & SHIPMENT: Manufactured and shipped in the USA. Dimensions include: Kid size (50"x 60") and Adult size(60"x 80"). The fleece blanket has the perfect size for bed, sofa or couch, but also great for outdoor use.
- MATERIAL: 100% polyester. The blanket is made of 100% high-grade polyester. The super soft and lightweight blanket will keep you warm and cozy on those cold nights.
- WAFFLE PATTERN :The waffle pattern of the blanket is modern and decorative.
- GOOD CHOICE AS A GIFT: The soft fuzzy warm flannel fleece blanket is perfect for holidays gift, Mother Day's Gift, Thanksgiving gift, Christmas gift to your family or friends.
- EASY TO CARE: This cozy-soft throw blanket is washable by machine in cold water with similar colors. Tumble-dry, low heat. No bleach. Do not iron.

results.title: Life's About Junkin' Pickin' and Paintin'  LL204 A - SVG DXF Fcm Ai Eps Png Jpg Digital file for Commercial and Personal Use
results.description:
This design can also be purchased as part of collection LL204 found here... https://www.etsy.com/listing/539264227/upcycling-vintage-diy-quote-collection?ref=shop_home_active_1

PLEASE READ AND UNDERSTAND BEFORE PURCHASING:
Thank you for visiting my digital design shop. Please understand that you are purchasing a digital design ONLY. You are not purchasing any finished product using this design and no physical item(s) will be sent to you. I do not have knowledge of every cutting and graphics software on the market so please know how to use these files BEFORE you purchase. I am glad to help you with simple questions if I am able to do so. If you find a problem with the file itself that needs to be addressed by me, please send me a convo and I will look into the matter and fix it as needed. My files are distributed in a zipped file folder and will need to be unzipped by you in order to access the enclosed files. A zipped folder will NOT open in your cutting software. The files included in the zipped folder are: SVG, DXF, FCM, AI, EPS, JPG, and PNG. Files are available for instant download as soon as you complete the purchase in most cases. You can find your purchased files by clicking on the “you” at the top of the Etsy page and then on “purchases and reviews”. Simply locate your purchase and then click on the download button. Please make a note of where the file is being stored on your computer when downloading because I can’t help you with locating the files once downloaded

My files are provided to you in the following formats:
►SVG - scalable vector graphics can be enlarged with no distortion or pixelation and can be used with many cutting software platforms including Cricut Design Space and Silhouette Studio DE 
►DXF - this format is for use in the basic Silhouette cutting software-the free version-and is scalable to size
►FCM - this format is especially for use in the Brother Scan N Cut Canvas Workspace software
►AI - Adobe Illustrator format for use with Adobe Illustrator and some cutting software platforms
►EPS - works with many higher end cutters as well as Illustrator and other design software
►JPG - printable image with a white background-image will blur when increased to sizes over approximately 6”x 6”
►PNG - a printable image with no background-can be used with a background of your choosing-image will blur when increased to sizes over approximately 6”x 6”

TERMS OF USE: 

What can I use this digital design for?
•	To create a physical product for personal use or to use as a gift.
•	To create a physical product to be sold online (must have a SUBSTANTIAL watermark over any photos used online) or at a local craft show and must be a physical product that YOU have made yourself using vinyl, htv, etc. I do NOT allow for print on demand site use.
•	Commercial small business use is defined as less than 500 end products produced.
•	To create a digital embroidery file for YOUR USE ONLY, to be used on a physical product.

What am I NOT allowed to use this digital design for?
•	You may NOT upload the design to any print on demand (POD) website for business use such as (but not limited to) Amazon Merch, Printful, and Zazzle.
•	You may not sub-license the design.
•	You may not share or upload the digital design in any way.
•	You may not upload the digital design to any public cloud or drive such as (but not limited to) Google Drive or Dropbox. The digital design may be stored there if you are the ONLY person who has access to the file.
•	You may not share the digital file, either for sale or free on Facebook or in any group, public, private, closed, or secret or through any method of social media.
•	You may not sell the digital design or any portion of the design in any digital format as a new design or as part of any organized collection of designs.
•	You may not TRACE the design and then sell it as your own.
•	You may not export the design to any other digital format (such as embroidery formats), unless being used ONLY by you to complete an end product, without purchasing a license from me. If you would like to sell the design in an embroidery digital format, my commercial use embroidery license is $30 PER DESIGN and must be purchased in my Etsy shop BEFORE selling the design. Contact me with any questions about embroidery file usage.
•	You may not post an image of the design either as an end product or as a digital photo unless the photo is HEAVILY watermarked through the design portion of the photo.

REFUNDS:

Because of the digital nature of my shop, I do not offer refunds once the design has been downloaded by you (Etsy lets me know that is has been downloaded and that is what I go by). If you have questions that need to be answered, please ask them BEFORE you purchase the file. Please understand this BEFORE YOU PURCHASE.

EMBROIDERY CONVERSION:

I DO allow for embroidery conversion for YOUR USE ONLY on an end product, either for sale, gifting, or personal use. I do NOT allow conversion with the intent to sell the resulting digital file unless you purchase my embroidery license found below. You must purchase a license for EACH DESIGN you wish to convert and sell...

https://www.etsy.com/listing/169876239/commercial-embroidery-license-agreement?ref=shop_home_active_1&ga_search_query=COMMERCIAL

YOU WILL FIND MY COMPLETE TERMS OF USE CONTAINED IN THE ZIPPED FOLDER UPON PURCHASE. PLEASE ABIDE BY THESE RULES COMPLETELY. ALL DESIGNS ARE PROTECTED BY COPYRIGHT HELD BY LYRICAL LETTERS DESIGN AND MAY NOT BE SOLD, SHARED, TRACED, OR OTHERWISE DUPLICATED.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Cut File SVG, love svg, svg file for Cricut Sihouette Cameo Vector, wall decal svg
results.description:
*** 8x10" (300dpi)
*** (5) FILE TYPES: .SVG, .DFX, .PNG, .JPG, .EPS (in a .zip file)
*** Commercial Use OK (printed items only)
*** INSTANT DOWNLOAD (no physical items will be mailed to you)

Commercial use for prints okay! Get creative with our commercial-use designs! Start making money selling printed items such as t-shirts, other clothing items, bags, totes, bibs, onesies, posters, framed art, mugs, cards and so much more! Not to be sold online in any digital format, only printed format. You can also use for personal use, such as gifts, scrapbooking, art prints, cards, clothing and more! Have fun with these designs! I'd love to see your creativity - post a photo with your review or send me an email svgsbylisa@gmail.com :)

[ CUSTOM SVG DESIGN ]

Yes, I create custom SVG designs! 
Click here: https://www.etsy.com/listing/591323061 

Want to add color to this design?
Click here: https://www.etsy.com/listing/599230959

You will receive:

>>> SVG cut file for your Cutting Machine
>>> DXF cut file for your Cutting Machine
>>> EPS (often used for embroidery file and to enlarge to larger scale without losing quality or crispness)
>>> Png (transparent background to be placed over any background)
>>> Jpg for printables or iron-on transfers

[ DELIVERY ]

After a successful purchase via Etsy you can receive your files instantly in 3 different ways:
1. You will be directed to a new page where you can click on the link to download the .zip file immediately.
2. You will receive an email with the link to download. 
3. You can go to your Etsy account under "Purchases & Reviews" to retrieve your instant download files.

NOTE: Windows has a standard zip file opener or you may download WinZip to open the zip file and extract the images. 

[ HELP / TECHNICAL ISSUES / REFUNDS ]

Please make sure you have knowledge of at least one of the file types includes and how to open and use the files (and software required) as I will not be able to provide "how-tos" as there are many different programs/methods/projects. There are many helpful resources on YouTube and Google Search - just type in what you have a question about and you should find your answer. If you have the correct software required but receive a corrupt file or do not receive the correct file, please email me at svgsbylisa@gmail.com so that I can remedy the situation. No refunds will be given on instant download digital items.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Round Wood Sign | Rose Gold | Modern | Wall Sign | Boho decor | Nursery Sign | Office decor | Faux Shiplap
results.description:
Live.  Laugh.  Love.  What a beautiful motto to strive to live by.  This modern sign is made from faux shiplap birch wood.  The words "live laugh love" have been laser cut to precision, then painted white and affixed to the birch wood round. This sign can easily lean against any shelf or mantle, or be hung by a Command strip (one is included in your purchase).  This would look particularly sweet in a nursery, kids room, office, entryway or on a family art wall.

Pick one up for yourself or gift one to your favorite loved one!  What a perfect gift for a baby shower, birthday, or "just because".

Details:
- Measurements are 12"h x 12"w and 1/4" depth
- Materials: the base is painted faux shiplap birch wood; and the words "live laugh love" are painted MDF board.
- each sign comes with one Command strip for easy hanging that won't damage your doors or walls

Each sign is made-to-order and the colors and dimensions may vary slightly, but this is the beauty of owning one-of-a-kind custom decor!  If you are looking for different colors or have a variation idea, please send me a message.  I'd love to design the perfect sign for you.

Thank you for shopping with us and supporting our small business. 

Keep up with our latest news and creations by following us on Facebook and IG: TheBlueCactusAZ

results.title: Live, Laugh, Love Hand Stamped Aluminum Cuff Bracelet / Inspirational Motivational Affirmation Hand Stamped Jewelry / Intention Jewelry
results.description:
This simple, yet beautiful, bracelet is made from aluminum and hand stamped with the words "live, laugh, love" with a small heart stamped on the end of each word.  A heart arrow design is stamped on the inside of the bracelet.  The edges of the bracelet are hammered slightly for a beautiful texture. These thin bracelets look great by themselves or wear several at a time.  

**Please note that this bracelet is 1/4" wide and is a thin cuff bracelet.  I begin with a 6" blank, and this bracelet will fit a variety of wrists.  If you need a smaller size, please let me know.**

Each letter and design stamp is done by hand.  Alignment, spacing, and depth of characters will vary from piece to piece, adding to the character of your handmade piece.  

Aluminum is very lightweight and very easy to wear.  It is perfect for everyday wear, will not tarnish and is hypoallergenic.  The bracelets can be adjusted slightly when they are worn and will accommodate many wrist sizes.  I recommend adjusting the cuff when you first receive it.  Repeated opening and closing of the cuffs will weaken the metal and it may eventually snap.  Care instructions are included with each order.  Please contact me if you have any questions.  

Each piece will arrive in a muslin bag for gift-giving and safekeeping, as shown in the pictures.  A pro polishing pad is also included with each order to help you keep your new jewelry clean and shiny.  

If you would like a different message stamped on the bracelet, please contact me for a custom request.  I would be happy to accommodate.  
_________________________________________________________________________________________
Each piece is made to order.  Great care and time is taken to create each piece. Due to the nature of handmade items, some slight variations may occur. Each piece is created after it is ordered and is unique. "Imperfections" or "flaws" add to the character and uniqueness of each piece.  Since each piece is hand stamped, alignment, spacing, and depth of the letters may vary from each piece.  This all adds to the character of your handmade piece.  

Colors may vary from monitor to monitor.
_____________________________________________________________________________________

Want to receive 20% off your order?  Copy & paste this link into your web browser to sign up for my e-mail list.  You will then receive an INSTANT coupon code to apply to your purchase at checkout.   http://eepurl.com/cV_xab

Visit my other shop My Sweet September for other inspirational jewelry, custom photo pendants, and sterling silver and 14K gold-filled jewelry.

results.title: Beach T-shirt, Live Love Laugh at the Beach Tee,  Summer Vacation Shirt, Beach Life, Shells
results.description:
Beach T-shirt, Live Love Laugh at the Beach Tee,  Summer Vacation Shirt, Beach Life, Shells

• Fashion fit
• Clothing style: Athletic
• Neckline: Crewneck
• Sleeve length: Short sleeve

Handmade in our shop with high quality retail printing on a high quality Bella + Canvas fashion t-shirt.
Solid Colors - 4.2 oz.(US) 7 oz.(CA), 100% Airlume combed and ringspun cotton
Heather Colors - 4.2 oz.(US) 7 oz.(CA), 52/48 Airlume combed and ringspun cotton/polyester
Heather Prism Colors - 4.2 oz.(US) 7 oz.(CA), 99/1 Airlume combed and ringspun cotton/polyester

Care Instructions
Wash in cold/warm water and tumble dry with low heat turning the shirt inside out. Do not iron.

Sizing (Unisex) - Also see size chart in images.

Body Length - Measured from the highest part of the shoulder to the bottom hem.
(XS-27", SM-28", MD-29", LG-30", XL-31", 2X-32", 3X-33", 4X-34", 5X-35")

Body Width - Measured from side seem to side seem just below the sleeve.
(XS-16.5", SM-18", MD-20", LG-22", XL-24", 2X-26", 3X-28", 4X-30", 5X-32")

Processing & Shipping
We process/print to order from our shop in central Ohio. Orders are processed and shipped in 1-3 business days.

results.title: Beach Life Collage T-Shirt,  Summer Tee, Beach Life Shirt
results.description:
Beach Life Collage T-Shirt,  Summer Tee, Beach Life Shirt

• Fashion fit
• Clothing style: Athletic
• Neckline: Crewneck
• Sleeve length: Short sleeve

Handmade in our shop with high quality retail printing on a high quality Bella + Canvas fashion t-shirt.
Solid Colors - 4.2 oz.(US) 7 oz.(CA), 100% Airlume combed and ringspun cotton
Heather Colors - 4.2 oz.(US) 7 oz.(CA), 52/48 Airlume combed and ringspun cotton/polyester
Heather Prism Colors - 4.2 oz.(US) 7 oz.(CA), 99/1 Airlume combed and ringspun cotton/polyester

Care Instructions
Wash in cold/warm water and tumble dry with low heat turning the shirt inside out. Do not iron.

Sizing (Unisex) - Also see size chart in images.

Body Length - Measured from the highest part of the shoulder to the bottom hem.
(XS-27", SM-28", MD-29", LG-30", XL-31", 2X-32", 3X-33", 4X-34", 5X-35")

Body Width - Measured from side seem to side seem just below the sleeve.
(XS-16.5", SM-18", MD-20", LG-22", XL-24", 2X-26", 3X-28", 4X-30", 5X-32")

Processing & Shipping
We process/print to order from our shop in central Ohio. Orders are processed and shipped in 1-3 business days.
